plays.text: Penalty to Alexander Ovechkin 2 minutes for Hooking Serge Aubin

Goal scored by Bobby Holik assisted by Jim Slater
Penalty to Chris Clark 5 minutes for Fighting Ilya Kovalchuk
Penalty to Ilya Kovalchuk 2 minutes for Roughing Jeff Halpern served by Ronald Petrovicky
Penalty to Slava Kozlov 5 minutes for Fighting Chris Clark
Penalty to Jeff Halpern 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Ilya Kovalchuk 2 minutes for High Sticking Jeff Halpern
